name: Technical Issues
description:
In this game you play as mechanic who stood agains everything and everyone ruling. You will kill numerous enemies,collect loot,go to shops-all of this to defeat The Leaders.Dodge bullets and shoot back-this is the key for victory!

Controls:

Left Mouse Button - shoot from weapon 1

Right Mouse Button - shoot from weapon 2

Middle Mouse Button - item use( not all items are active!Some are passive)
